title: 07/01/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/01/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin's happy for Chris Paul finally getting the recognition he deserves after reaching the NBA Finals for the first time in his career. He thinks the Clippers need to accept their reality and limitations after building the team around Kawhi Leonard who regularly misses games. He takes a look into the future of college sports as players are now able to get paid for their name, image and likeness. Plus, World Series Champion and Dodgers 3B Justin Turner joins the show to talk about his All-Star caliber season and the difficulties of being the reigning champs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
